title: A Golden Tragedy
description: A Golden Tragedy is the story of a king who loved his daughter very much and would do anything to please her. One day, Penelope told her father that she wished her birds could lay golden eggs. In an effort to please his daughter, the king made a wish that would literally change everything. Illustrations support the text.
highFrequencyWords: bewildered, dithered, embrace, enlist, frenzied, fretted, furiously, glistened, humble, pheasant, precious, tragic, wake, wealthy
